person_say: I've been stuck with no ideas for my writing. I doubt any tips will really help.
animal_say: I hear you! There's a little bee named Bizy who specializes in buzzing away procrastination and getting those creative juices flowing. Want to meet her and see if she can help spark some inspiration?

person_say: No thanks, I don't think a bee can help me with my writing inspiration.
animal_say: I understand! Writing inspiration can come from different angles. Are you looking for tips on time management to get started, or would you prefer some relaxation techniques to clear your mind?
